mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.rcpt_no AS "rcptNo", a.patientid AS "patientid", a.name AS "name", a.name_phonetic AS "namePhonetic", a.identity AS "identity", a.charge_type AS "chargeType", a.unit_in_contract AS "unitInContract", a.visit_date AS "visitDate", a.total_costs AS "totalCosts", a.total_charges AS "totalCharges", a.operator_no AS "operatorNo", a.charge_indicator AS "chargeIndicator", a.refunded_rcpt_no AS "refundedRcptNo", a.acct_no AS "acctNo", a.printed_operator_no AS "printedOperatorNo", a.printed_date AS "printedDate", a.card_flag AS "cardFlag", a.printed_rcpt_no AS "printedRcptNo", a.flag AS "flag", a.invoice_no AS "invoiceNo", a.bz AS "bz", a.insurance_no AS "insuranceNo", a.ord_invoice_no AS "ordInvoiceNo", a.reckon_no AS "reckonNo", a.rcpt_print AS "rcptPrint", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO outp_rcpt_master( id, rcpt_no, patientid, name, name_phonetic, identity, charge_type, unit_in_contract, visit_date, total_costs, total_charges, operator_no, charge_indicator, refunded_rcpt_no, acct_no, printed_operator_no, printed_date, card_flag, printed_rcpt_no, flag, invoice_no, bz, insurance_no, ord_invoice_no, reckon_no, rcpt_print, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{rcptNo}, #{patientid}, #{name}, #{namePhonetic}, #{identity}, #{chargeType}, #{unitInContract}, #{visitDate}, #{totalCosts}, #{totalCharges}, #{operatorNo}, #{chargeIndicator}, #{refundedRcptNo}, #{acctNo}, #{printedOperatorNo}, #{printedDate}, #{cardFlag}, #{printedRcptNo}, #{flag}, #{invoiceNo}, #{bz}, #{insuranceNo}, #{ordInvoiceNo}, #{reckonNo}, #{rcptPrint}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE outp_rcpt_master SET rcpt_no = #{rcptNo}, patientid = #{patientid}, name = #{name}, name_phonetic = #{namePhonetic}, identity = #{identity}, charge_type = #{chargeType}, unit_in_contract = #{unitInContract}, visit_date = #{visitDate}, total_costs = #{totalCosts}, total_charges = #{totalCharges}, operator_no = #{operatorNo}, charge_indicator = #{chargeIndicator}, refunded_rcpt_no = #{refundedRcptNo}, acct_no = #{acctNo}, printed_operator_no = #{printedOperatorNo}, printed_date = #{printedDate}, card_flag = #{cardFlag}, printed_rcpt_no = #{printedRcptNo}, flag = #{flag}, invoice_no = #{invoiceNo}, bz = #{bz}, insurance_no = #{insuranceNo}, ord_invoice_no = #{ordInvoiceNo}, reckon_no = #{reckonNo}, rcpt_print = #{rcptPrint}, update_date = #{updateDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.name, a.name_phonetic, a.identity, a.charge_type, a.unit_in_contract, b.doctor, b.visit_dept, b.visit_no, a.RCPT_NO, a.VISIT_DATE, a.TOTAL_COSTS, a.TOTAL_CHARGES, a.OPERATOR_NO, a.REFUNDED_RCPT_NO, a.PRINTED_OPERATOR_NO, a.PRINTED_DATE, a.INVOICE_NO, a.RCPT_PRINT FROM OUTP_RCPT_MASTER a , clinic_master b where b.clinic_no=#{clinicNo} and a.patientid=b.id and (TOTAL_COSTS >= 0 and TOTAL_CHARGES >= 0) and REFUNDED_RCPT_NO is null and (card_flag < 'Y' or card_flag is null)
